block.p: Susan Eileen Skipper, the daughter of Jean Skipper of Kinderhook, N.Y., and the late Robert Lee Skipper, is to be married this afternoon to Daniel Christopher Burke, the son of Jean and Richard Burke of Holbrook, N.Y. The Rev. Steven Peterson will perform the ceremony at St. Mary's Roman Catholic Church in East Islip, N.Y.
The couple, both 30, graduated from the State University at Albany.

Susan Eileen Skipper, the daughter of Jean Skipper of Kinderhook, N.Y., and the late Robert Lee Skipper, is to be married this afternoon to Daniel Christopher Burke, the son of Jean and Richard Burke of Holbrook, N.Y. The Rev. Steven Peterson will perform the ceremony at St. Mary's Roman Catholic Church in East Islip, N.Y.
The couple, both 30, graduated from the State University at Albany.

The bride is a sales manager in New York for IDG Books Worldwide, a publishing company. Her father was a nuclear engineer in Melville, N.Y., for Asea Brown Boveri, an international engineering company. Her mother is a nurse at the Barnwell Nursing Home in Kinderhook.

The bridegroom, who received a law degree from St. John's University, is an associate at the law office of Patrick F. Adams in Bay Shore, N.Y. His father is a detective in the Suffolk County Police Department.
